name: Orlando 18ft Pool Deck Plan – Elevated Above-Ground Pool Deck with Railing
open_features: (9) 18×18×12 in concrete footings with 6×6 SP No.2 posts
Railings: 4×4 posts, 2×4 rails, 2×2 balusters @6 in O.C. (≤4 in gap)
Hardware: Simpson ABU44Z bases, H1A hurricane ties, LPC4Z caps, LSC stringer connectors, A34 clips, HUC412 hangers
Pool integration schematic only; electrical bonding, safety & compliance by licensed pool contractors
safety_note: Plans are preliminary; pool-specific safety, electrical, and code compliance must be handled by licensed professionals.
